it.polimi.se2018.view

Interface ControllerActionsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    App, CLIApp, JavaFXApp

    public interface ControllerActionsInterface
    Interface for Controller-View communication
    Author:
    Mathyas Giudici

              int yourPrivateObjectiveCard,
              int[] publicObjectiveCards,
              int[] toolCards,
              RoundTrackerView roundTracker)
        View's metod to initialize a game
        Parameters:
        players - contains game's players
        yourPrivateObjectiveCard - contains localPlayer's private objective card
        publicObjectiveCards - contains public objective cards
        toolCards - contains tool cards
        roundTracker - contains game's round tracker

      • addUpdate

        void addUpdate(int playerID,
               int height,
               int width,
               int reserveIndex)
        To notify a Die placement in a player's grid
        Parameters:
        playerID - contains the playerID of the player has just done placement
        height - contains the height position on the grid
        width - contains the width position on the grid
        reserveIndex - contains the reserveIndex of the die just placed
